title: BUP signs memo with Osmani Centre for Peace and Security Studies
body: Bangladesh University of Professionals signed a memorandum of understanding with the Osmani Centre for Peace and Security Studies at the VIP Lounge on BUP campus in Dhaka on Monday. The MoU aims at strengthening cooperation in academic, research and administrative fields, creating opportunities for mutual exchange of knowledge and resources, said a press release. Vice-chancellor of BUP Major General Md Mahbub-ul Alam along with other officials of BUP and a delegation from OCPASS were present at the signing ceremony. Brigadier General Muhammad Ali Talukder, dean, faculty of security and strategic studies, BUP, and Mohammad Mahfuzur Rahman, chairman, OCPASS, signed the agreement on behalf of their respective sides.
